title: Maker-Based Mathematics Experience Workshop: Problem-Solving and Creativity Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, geometry) and fundamental digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners connect mathematical concepts with physical artifacts through maker activities, utilizing digital fabrication tools (3D modeling, laser cutting, etc.)

learning_goals: Develop three or more real-life problem-solving models applying mathematical concepts (geometry, ratios, functions).
Self-correct over 80% of mathematical errors occurring during the design and execution of collaborative maker projects.
Complete one artwork visualizing mathematical principles using digital fabrication tools (3D printer, laser cutter).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
